comment: Based on the 1.083 OG I need 30 grams of dry yeast, so 15 each.  Also play around with the tropical fruit extracts?

Ca 159
Sulfate 104 (gypsum)
Chloride 207 (cal chloride)
High chloride gives that creamy/smooth mouth feel.

8oz amarillo and 4 mosaic in the boil, then hopped the SO5 with 4 mosaic during fermentation and 4 amarillo after ferm, the other 4 simcoe during ferm and 4 simcoe after. both around 1.010 1 week in. if it stays there they will be 7.5%, a good IPA, but not double.
one SO5 the other is K97 german ale
